content.new:
the cylinder lid around the mating hole (standpipe) doesn't give any lidar returns - making lidar-based alignment impossible
![http://people.csail.mit.edu/mfallon/share/2013apr/vrc_issues/valve_face.png](http://people.csail.mit.edu/mfallon/share/2013apr

issue.title: The VRC Valve doesn't give lidar returns on its collar
